name: Take the Trash Out!
description:
Take the Trash Out!

Experimental game project. The task is simple, just take the trash out! Can you do it?

You wake up in the late afternoon and the house is a mess. There is rubbish everywhere. Your wife left a message for you on the fridge: 'Take the trash out!'

Simple, no? So let's do it!

Controls:

WASD: Move
E: Interact
Mouse: Look
Right Click: Zoom
L-Shift: Run
L-Ctrl: Crouch
Tab: Menu
Esc: Pause (No pause menu yet, alt+f4 to quit)

----------------

Development Status:

- Filling the spaces with more items;
- Increasing the level of randomness on the procedural system;
- Fixing bugs regarding the navmesh;
- Adding animations to characters;
- Creating proper Splash, Main Menu and Death scenes;
- Creating Pause Menu (Need a alt+f4 to quit);
- Incrementing the item menu;

----------------

Please, let me know your feedback on the comments below! Thank you all for playing!

Credits:

Psx Assets from Elbolilloduro
